name: White Party
description:
Hello There! In this game, you have to control our character in the deep space of space and collect the stars of the right color and pass through the portal before the time runs out. If time runs out, everything will teleport to a random location! This game is a game made for GMTK Game Jam and it was made in a total of 48 hours. Controls Up Movement: W  Move Left: A  Move Down: S  Move Right: D Slow Down: SPACE

System Requirements and Information

The game has been developed at a level that can open even the worst devices. You can contact us about all the bugs, suggestions and complaints you find in the game from the Discord section.  The following music was used for this media project: Music:  Countdown by Alexander Nakarada Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4865-countdown License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license  Artist website: https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com/ Trturist (UI, Pixel Artist, Sound&Music) MosleyDev (Programmer) Ichuusy (Programmer)
